messages.subject: school supplies (was: A Rant About Homeschoolers)
messages.msgSnippet: My MIL sent our boys a $60 gift card for Target.  Included was a note that said to go buy some school supplies.  So off to Target we went and we came home with
messages.messageBody:
My MIL sent our boys a $60 gift card for Target. Included was a note that
said to go buy some school supplies. So off to Target we went and we came
home with a new pair of track pants for each boy, a new shirt for each, a
tent set (tent, child's folding chair, sleeping bag, flashlight, and
thermometer/compass/whistle/magnifying glass) and a new Spongebob DVD.

School supplies are great! LOL

Aimee...you got your glue for .15? I had to pay a whole .20! :o)

Jen :o)
Mom to Beck (7) and Dane (4...almost 5!)
Learning the natural way every day!
